price: 59. Oyo akela likolo na mabele, na maye manso mazali otei na yango nyoso mibale na mikolo motoba, mpe sima amitombwami na likolo ya ngwende, Ar-Rahmân(1) nde tika ete otuna sé oyo ayebi manso.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ فَسۡـَٔلۡ بِهِۦ خَبِيرٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā fī sittati ayyāmin thumma is'tawā ʿalā al-ʿarshi al-raḥmānu fasal bihi khabīran
